text: Nethraa is a 2019 Indian Tamil thriller film co-produced and directed by A. Venkatesh. The film features a cast including Vinay, Thaman Kumar and Subiksha in the lead roles and visualization by cinematographer A. Jeyaprakash. The music was composed by Srikanth Deva, with editing by N. Vinaj. The film, predominantly shot in Canada, began production during August 2016, was released on 9 February 2019. The film received highly negative reviews.http://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/kollywood/080916/venkatesh- tries-his-hands-on-a-thriller.html ==Cast== *Vinay Rai as Vikram *Thaman Kumar as Velu *Subiksha as Nethraa *Riythvika as Jessie *Robo Shankar as Actor *Motta Rajendran *Imman Annachi as Kasi *Vincent Asokan as Ravi *A. Venkatesh *G. K. Reddy as Nethraa's godfather *A. Jeyaprakash *Vijay Ganesh ==Production== The film materialised during August 2016, with Vinay announcing that he would work with on a film with A. Venkatesh and subsequently the shoot began during August 2016. Venkatesh then selected Subiksha to play the leading female role, that of the titular character who travels from Karaikudi to Canada. Venkatesh picked the actress after being impressed with her performance in Vijay Milton's Kadugu (2016), which the pair worked on. Thaman Kumar was also selected to portray a role in the film, while a comedy track with Rajendran and Robo Shankar was filmed during September 2016.https://www.thehindu.com/features/cinema/Etcetera/article14640025.ece Further portions of the film were shot in Karaikudi and in Germany.https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/tamil/movies/news/working- with-two-veterans-was-a-memorable-experience-subiksha/articleshow/65258728.cms Many critical and mind blowing visuals of the film was done by cinematographer A. Jeyaprakash .The shoot of the film was completed by early 2017.https://silverscreen.in/tamil/features/vinay-rai-interview-i-had-to- wait-11-years-to-shed-my-chocolate-boy-image/ ==Soundtrack== The Soundtrack was composed by Srikanth Deva.https://gaana.com/album/nethraa *"Kaikorkarva" - Namitha *"Sollamale" - Namitha, Sri *"Asku Busku" - Deva *"Annachi" - Guru Ayyadurai ==Reception== Cinema Express wrote "Witnessing A Venkatesh, a filmmaker who has been in the industry for three decades, make such a film is, to put it lightly, disheartening".https://www.cinemaexpress.com/reviews/tamil/2019/feb/08/nethraa- review-10016.html Times of India wrote "the film-making lets you down, with crude staging, amateurish performances, haphazard editing and over loud score."https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/tamil/movie- reviews/nethraa/movie-review/67900422.cms ==References== == External links == * Category:2019 films Category:Indian films Category:2010s Tamil-language films Category:Indian thriller films Category:Films shot in Canada Category:Films directed by A. Venkatesh (director) Category:2019 thriller films
title: Nethraa
